nodes.text: Beneath Aucellis Park is a mini role-playing adventure by Morrie Mullins that published on the Wizards of the Coast website on August 21, 2003. The adventure was designed for use in any publishing era, but was specifically taylored for use in the Rebellion era.

The heroes are on the trail of a smuggler and "death merchant" who leads them to Aucellis Park, a thrill-a-minute tourist trap of spectacular rides and glitzy attractions. But something else is going on at the park, and if the heroes aren't careful, they'll lose more than their credits . . .
"Beneath Aucellis Park" is intended for four player characters of 7th to 9th level.
